subject: Re: Music vs no music
author: kenneth b thomas
full_text:
if i ever get evp worth sending ill send it.  till then -not going to 
waste time.



--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Misty Dawn <bulletbabea@...> wrote:
>
> Ken
>   Yes like a magnet for them. People ask me when did I become 
interested in "them" and rather than answer my reply is usually its 
more like when did "they" become interested in me.
>    
>   We'd love to hear your evp you get during your experiment. I 
checked my files and tho there are many hello's said many different 
ways I have never had a "yes hello" to my knowledge.
>    
>   As for the itc pics, I guess some could be considered "scary" LOL 
but I have never had any fear about any of this. I've dealt with the 
paranormal so long that to me its just normal. Tho when I first 
started the itc pics I would get hundreds of eyes staring back at me, 
it was a bit creepy. Then during evp they mentioned the pics and 
said "echo six is ready we have to look happy to you" so I did more 
itc and got alot of smiles and teeth. Creepier LOL. In later evp 
someone said "I told you were looking happy".
>    
>   They have also shown me pics/artwork of the "living". 
>    
>   I find it all quite fascinating.
>    
>   Misty
> 
>  
> ---------------------------------
> We won't tell. Get more on shows you hate to love
> (and love to hate): Yahoo! TV's Guilty Pleasures list.
>
